Item.source: 请不要记录我的登录名
Item.target: Do not remember my login name

Item.source: · 请使用您的ITCode和AD域用户密码登陆本系统
Item.target: * Please use your ITCode and the AD domain user password to log on the system

Item.source: · 忘记密码请点击此处重置
Item.target: * Forgot your password reset, click here

Item.source: · 人力资源数据和系统安全说明
Item.target: * Notice of HR Data & System Security for Users.

Item.source: 点击此处展开详细的错误信息...
Item.target: Click here to expand the detailed error message...

Item.source: 注销完成，点击这里返回应用
Item.target: Log off successfully, click here to return to application

Item.source: 用户'{0}'认证失败，请检查用户名和密码是否正确。
Item.target: User '{0}' Authentication failed, please check the user name and password are correct.

Item.source: 不能根据登录名'{0}'找到用户
Item.target: Can not find the user based on login name '{0}'
